title: ayyan allavO kALinga naTam
sahitya:
ayyan allavO ulaguyya kALiya naTam AduvadAgilum mana mOhanan ayyan allavO


anupallavi

  meyyumAnadO poyyum pOnadO mighu marai munivarum 
munaiyavum marai marai irai pashu niraiyuLLa emaduLam niraibavan


caraNam    kaLlamAghumODi karuNaiyallavODi uLLam vellumODi uyar vallavODi meLLap-pOvOmODi 
meyyum AvOmODi mEdini muzhuvadum kAlaLavAghiyum mIdamum yAvuLa OraDiyAghilum
